column1: tatar_union_diplo_desc;The Tatar States are weak and fragmented. For far to long we have underestimated the Russians and the fall of the Kazan Khanate proved this. The realization of this threat and the shifting balance of power has convinced our great Khan to reconsile with his old tatar rivals. All the Khans have agreed to reestablish the Altin Urda under our banner! Moscow will burn!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

tatar_union_mil_desc;The Tatar States were weak and fragmented. For far to long we have underestimated the Russians and the fall of the Kazan Khanate proved this. We need to overthrow our old rivals and reassert our dominance over the Russians once again. Âšerge Han!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
tatar_formation_desc;The Tatar States were weak and fragmented. After decades of struggle and decline we managed to subdue the Tatar Steppes
column2: now it is time to reclaim Batu Khans legacy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_kazan_desc;For centuries the raids originating from Kazan have devasteded. It is time to finally bring an end to the Tatar Joke!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
control_novgorod_desc;The Republic of Novgorod has been a part of our sphere of influence for centuries
column2: but with increasing russian nationalism we should integrate them further into our realm.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_estonia_desc;Estonia has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the estonian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_livonia_desc;Livonia has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the livonian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_ingermanland_desc;Ingria has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the ingrian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_nogay_rej_desc;The foolish Khan of Nogay has refused our offer. We need to subjugate him by the sword to save the Tatars from russian expansionism!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_nogay_acc_desc;The Khan of Nogay has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralize_the_khanate_desc;Now that the russian threat has been dealt with our rule is unchallenged. It is time to formally unite the Khanate!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_rej_desc;The foolish Khan of Qashliq has refused our offer. We need to subjugate him by the sword to save the Tatars from russian expansionism!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_acc_desc;The Khan of Qashliq has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_akh_acc_desc;The Khan of Astrakhan has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
avenge_kazan_desc;The russian conquest of Kazan was extremely brutal. It depopulated the once rich region of the Upper Idel
column2: thousends of Kazanis fleed their home and even more got killed by Skobelevs troops
column3: not to mention the ruthless execution of the Khan and it's entire family. It is our duty
column4: now that the Steppe stands united

column1: subdue_yugra_desc;The fur traders of the yugrian wastes were able to remain independant by opportunistically switching alliances with the Tatars and Russians. Now that we are dominating both Russia and the Steppe we are in a position to assume direcet control over their valueable ressources.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the cold wastes of Siberia are almost free to grab. The only thing holding us back is the influencial position of the Oirat Khagnate in Tuva and the Baikal. The conquest of the Sayan Tribes will increase our influence in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_altai_uriankhai_desc;Our increased influence in Tuva allows us to further integrate the region
column2: this act however will force the Oirats to act.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_buryatia_desc;The Oirat control in Central Siberia has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_daurs_title;Take control in the Daur Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_daurs_desc;The Oirat control in the North has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_manchu_desc;The momentum of the Pacific Push still hasn't slowed down. A lot of Tatar tribes still search for their own
column2: new
column3: suitable plot of land. Many of these tribes now violated the territory of the Jurchen
column4: a tributary of the Great Shun. This needs to be settled so that further conflict can be avoided.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: further_siberian_expansion_desc;The semi-nomadic Sakhalar originally fleed from the mongols in the 13th century. They now live in the rich basins of the Lena
column2: Aldan and Vilyuy Rivers and are fabled as horse breeders. But now they pose the last obstacle in our Push to the Pacific
column3: their subjugating would not only give us access to their skills
column4: but also their rich fur market.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_pacific_desc;Our troops have finally reached the long awaited coastline
column2: but our forces meet resistance from the local population. Even though our troops were successfull
column3: the areas of Kamchatka and Chukchia are now almost uninhabitated. Nevertheless
column4: we should formally announce the annexetion of these territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conquest_of_the_north_desc;The land of the Tymyr was thought to be only a part of Siberlar folklore
column2: but with our conquest multiple multiple reports have told us about a group of people far in the north speaking a familiar sounding language. We should use this to justify the conquest of these regions!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_northern_caucasus_desc;While the Northwestern Caucasus has been under our control for centuries the Northeast has been part of the Timurid Empire
column2: but the recent collapse of the iranian behemoth left the entire Caucasus in turmoil. Local Khanates
column3: Tribes and Christian Kingdoms is all what is left. This is a perfect opportunity to not only establish a amazing natural border
column4: but also to integrate the turkic tribes living in these regions!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_qasim_desc;The Tatars of Qasim originated from the lands of the Golden Horde
column2: but during their collapse thousends of Tatars fleed. The Hetmans of Ryazan and Kursk offered them refugee. In exchange they were ordered to protect the border regions and during time most of them even converted to Christianity. Now that the Khanate is united once again we should reincorporate our lost brethern!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_northern_caucasus_rth_desc;While the Northwestern Caucasus has been under our control for centuries the Northeast has been part of the Timurid Empire
column2: but the recent collapse of the iranian behemoth left the entire Caucasus in turmoil. Local Khanates
column3: Tribes and Christian Kingdoms is all what is left. This is a perfect opportunity to establish a amazing natural border!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_northern_caucasus_rus_desc;While the Northwestern Caucasus has been under our control for centuries the Northeast has been part of the Timurid Empire
column2: but the recent collapse of the iranian behemoth left the entire Caucasus in turmoil. Local Khanates
column3: Tribes and Christian Kingdoms is all what is left. This is a perfect opportunity to establish a amazing natural border!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: subdue_yugra_rus_desc;The fur traders of the yugrian wastes were able to remain independant by opportunistically switching alliances with the Tatars and Russians. Now that we are dominating both Russia and the Steppe we are in a position to assume direcet control over their valueable ressources.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
subdue_the_sayan_rus_desc;Now that we extended our control to the banks of the Yenisey
column2: the cold wastes of Siberia are almost free to grab. The only thing holding us back is the influencial position of the Oirat Khagnate in Tuva and the Baikal. The conquest of the Sayan Tribes will increase our influence in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_altai_uriankhai_rus_desc;Our increased influence in Tuva allows us to further integrate the region
column2: this act however will force the Oirats to act.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_buryatia_rus_desc;The Oirat control in Central Siberia has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_daurs_rus_title;Take control in the Daur Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_daurs_rus_desc;The Oirat control in the North has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_manchu_russia_desc;The momentum of the Pacific Push still hasn't slowed down. A lot of Cossacks still search for their own
column2: new
column3: suitable plot of land. Many of these tribes now violated the territory of the Jurchen
column4: a tributary of the Great Shun. This needs to be settled so that further conflict can be avoided.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: further_siberian_expansion_rus_desc;The semi-nomadic Sakhalar originally fleed from the mongols in the 13th century. They now live in the rich basins of the Lena
column2: Aldan and Vilyuy Rivers and are fabled as horse breeders. But now they pose the last obstacle in our Push to the Pacific
column3: their subjugating would not only give us access to their skills
column4: but also their rich fur market.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_manchu_ruthenia_desc;The momentum of the Pacific Push still hasn't slowed down. A lot of Cossacks still search for their own
column2: new
column3: suitable plot of land. Many of these tribes now violated the territory of the Jurchen
column4: a tributary of the Great Shun. This needs to be settled so that further conflict can be avoided.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_pacific_rus_desc;Our troops have finally reached the long awaited coastline
column2: but our forces meet resistance from the local population. Even though our troops were successfull
column3: the areas of Kamchatka and Chukchia are now almost uninhabitated. Nevertheless
column4: we should formally announce the annexetion of these territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recreate_bulghar_khanate_desc;The Bulghars once lived in what is now Kazan. While their origins aren't known many think that the Chuvash are their direct decendents or are atleast linguistically related. As we have now established a dominant position in both Inner and Outer Kazan we are able to reclaim their lost legacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

build_white_sea_canal_desc;The Anglo-Nordic control over the Baltic Sea still poses a risk for trade and conflict. If we connect the Wyg with Lake Onega we would be able to circumvent their tariffs while at the same time make use of the Northeast Passage. This would strengthen the regions of Karelia and Kola.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

con_cossacks_desc;While the Kazani Raids are over the tribes of Astrakhan and Crimea still threaten our influence in the Steppe. With the support of the Cossacks we would be able to counter their raids.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
proclaim_tsardom_desc;Now that we control a realm stretching from the Urals to the Steppes
column2: we can proclaim the the Tsardom of Russia. While this title will probably not be recognized by the other Great Powers
column3: this will certainly support our Pan-Russian Ambitions.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_russia_desc;The russian states have been disunited ever since the collapse of the Kievian Rus'. However
column2: now that we managed to build a power base and established ourselves as the leading force in russian unification it is time to reclaim our lost glory and
column3: after centuries
column4: shake of the Tatar Joke!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_ruthenia_desc;The russian states have been disunited ever since the collapse of the Kievian Rus'. However
column2: now that we managed to build a power base and established ourselves as the leading force in russian unification it is time to reclaim our lost glory and
column3: after centuries
column4: shake of the Tatar Joke!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reunite_imeretia_desc;The Kingdom of Imereti was an independant state ever since the dissolution of Georgia. However
column2: the recent subjugation and vassalization by the Timurids left the Kingdom in ruins. Local nobles used this opportunity to declare independence from Kutaisi. We need to restore Imereti
column3: and ultimately reclaim Georgia!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_georgia_desc;The State of Georgia was once a pan-caucasian power
column2: but countless invasions of the Timurids and the plague left the nation in despair and anarchy. Ultimately
column3: this resulted in the fraction into the four Kingdoms of Imereti
column4: Kakheti
column5: Samtskhe and Kartli. Of whom only the first one was able to withstand annexetion from the Timurids until the early 18th century. If we were able to unite these four states under our rule
column6: we could reassert ourselves as the Lords of the Caucasus!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_alvuania_desc;Alvuania (or Albania) was a medieval Kingdom in what is now Aran. Together with Georgia and Armenia they were the first nations to convert to christianity
column2: but today most of the inhabitants assimilated into persian culture and converting to Islam. However
column3: smaller christian alvuani communties still exist all along the Kura River. We should integrate them into our realm!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_armenia_desc;The Armenians can be found all over the Caucasus. However
column2: their main settlement area is near Lake Van and in the Rum province. We should instrumentalize their scattered settlements and expand our claims!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_sochi_desc;The city of Sochi once was part of the Kingdom of Abkhazia
column2: which got integrated into Georgia in the 11th century. The city itself was part of the georgian state until the 15th century
column3: when Georgia was dismantled. Now that we rebuild the state we should lay claims on the city!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: control_darial_desc;The Dar-i Alan (or Darial) Gorge is the only bigger pass through the Greater Caucasus. Furthermore the area is inhabitated by the Ossetians
column2: who
column3: for the most part or Orthodox Christians. It is in our interest to claim both sides of this path!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_alania_desc;The Kingdom of Alania was a major power in the North Caucasus during the middle ages. During the Mongol Invasion the Kingdom was destroyed
column2: many Alanians fled into the safety of the Greater Caucasian Mountains
column3: while others joined the Mongols. As we are now a free state again we should reclaim our once lost lands!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or Mets Hayk' originally referred to Armenian Kingdom in the Armenian Highlands. However
column3: since the Middle Ages the term was used to distinguish it from Cilicia
column4: the last independent western armenian state. Now is the time to instrumentalize the term to lay claim on the a unified Armenia

column1: join_armenia_desc;Now that a new armenian state has been established
column2: we should unify with our brethern.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_armenia_desc;With the Azeri Khanates defeated and Eastern Armenia reclaimed
column2: we should proclaim a new armenian state!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_eastern_armenia_desc;Ever since the end of Bagratids
column2: armenian statehood was fragile
column3: with only two minor armenian domains: Cilicia and Khachen. Of whom only we survived until now
column4: even though not entirely independent. However
column5: the recent and unexpected collapse of the Timurids change this. While we are now a sovereign state
column6: new threats arrose: The Azeri Khanates. We should utilize this new situation and to quickly reclaim Eastern Armenia!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_iran_desc;The Timurid Collapse left the Iranian Highlands in turmoil. Multiple warlords
column2: pretenders and republicans all claim to be the rightfull rulers over Iran. However
column3: we managed to defeat all of them and reunify central and western Iran. The next obvious step would be to adopt the title Shahanshah
column4: King of Kings.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_the_west_desc;Iraq was an integral part of iranian empires and dynasties for centuries. Baghdad and her predecessors acted as the capital of both the Sassanids and Arsacid Empires. Furthermore the regions spiritual importance
column2: in form of the holy sites in Najaf
column3: aswell as the fertile and strategic position emphasize our vital interest in this region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_kurdistan_desc;The eastern kurdish tribes inhabit both sides of the mighty Zagros mountains
column2: a barrier that protected the iranian heartland for ages. However
column3: local chieftains only answered to the Shahanshah himself. Due to the recent collapse of the Timurid Empire these chieftains united in a federation-like state and now are threatening neighbouring powers. We need to subdue them once again!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_the_caucasus_desc;Following the Timurid Collapse the southern Caucasus fell into chaos and anarchy. Local turkish warlords are fighting for dominace over the region
column2: while in the east both the Talysh and Tats declared independent states. In the northern Caucasus
column3: however the situation hasn't changed. We need to restore order in the southern Caucasus!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: once dependent on Timurid rule are now laying waste to the fragile ports in the desert-like region of Hormuzgan. Since we managed to subdue the Abdali Afghan tribes in eastern Khorasan we should finally turn our attention to these trouble makers!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_khorasan_desc;The region of Eastern Khorasan was one of the first areas to rebel against timurid rule. However
column2: the afghan confederation quickly collapsed due to tribal rivalries between the western Abdali tribes and the eastern Ghilzai tribes. We should use this opportunity to restore order in Khorasan!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
or Eastern Turkomans migrated into Aran and Azarbaijan in th 11th century. Due to extensive contact with the locals most of them assimilated into the iranian population. However
column3: many of the non assimilated tribes still played a major roll in the Caucasus and Eastern Anatolia
column4: mainly as loyal elite soldiers and conquerors. Thus mainting a military and political position in the area. We should unite these tribes under our banner!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_western_turks_desc;The Turks of Anatolia have been disunited ever since Timur's Anatolian Invasion. The once mighty Ottomans errupted into a civil war
column2: ultimately leading to their demise and subjegation by the Bulgarians
column3: while the remaining tribes joined Timur. Now that Timurid control has collapsed we should use this opportunity to unite with our western brethren!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       §R (Gameplay Note: Taking this decision will prevent you from claiming Western Iran);;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or the east
column3: once was the centre of the islamic world
column4: but
column6: could never recover from the devastating mongol invasion. The Timurid Collapse lead to the creation of an decentralized and weak arab state
column7: with the united power of our anatolian brethern we should impose our rule on both Iraq and Syria!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invade_caucasus_crescent_desc;Following the Timurid Collapse the southern Caucasus fell into chaos and anarchy. Local turkish warlords are fighting for dominace over the region
column2: while in the east both the Talysh and Tats declared independent states. In the northern Caucasus
column3: however the situation hasn't changed. We need to restore order in the southern Caucasus!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invade_kurds_desc;The eastern kurdish tribes inhabit both sides of the mighty Zagros mountains
column2: a barrier that protected the iranian heartland for ages. However
column3: local chieftains only answered to the Shahanshah himself. Due to the recent collapse of the Timurid Empire these chieftains united in a federation-like state and now are threatening neighbouring powers. We need to subdue them once again!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      §R (Gameplay Note: Taking this decision will prevent you from claiming Western Iran);;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invade_iraq_desc;Iraq was once the centre of the islamic world
column2: but could never recover from the devastating mongol invasion. The Timurid Collapse lead to the creation of an decentralized and weak arab state
column3: with the Kurds out of our way we should be easily able to subdue them.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_iran_desc;Now that the Kurds are subdued and Iraq under our control
column2: they gates to Iran are open. We should use the current turmoil there to establish a strong turkic state!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_rum_desc;Now that we drove out the Timurids from our lands
column2: we should get rid of the Bulgarians
column3: too. Anatolia shall be unified under the Rum Sultanate!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_the_north_caucasus_desc;We should unite the Northern Caucasus to protect our people from forgein powers!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
proclaim_shamkhalate_desc;Now that we are free from the Timurids we should reinstitute our dominance over the Avars and Dargins!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_mawarannahr_desc;Mawarannahr - or Transoxiana - is the last center of timurid rule. A lot of uzbek tribesmen are still loyal to them
column2: we should integrate this territory to not only end timurid rule once and for all
column3: but also to establish a proper buffer area against Kyrgyz raids!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: subdue_afghans_desc;While the Abdali Afghans were already subjugated the Ghilzai are still vassals of the Sayyids. We should push further east to establish control over the Hindu Kush and Sulaiman Range passes!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_khwarzem_desc;Khwarezm once was a center of iranian literature and culture. However
column2: the mongol invasions devestated the local population
column3: leading to a slow assimilation to Turks and Persians. We should reintegrate this region into Iran
column4: as it was the origin of the last local

column1: proclaim_iranzamin_desc;We managed to establish our rule in all of Greater Iran
column2: reaching from the Euphrates to the Hindu Kush and from the Aral Sea to the Persian Gulf.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_uzbeks_desc;We managed to defeat the other uzbek tribes and khanates. It's about time to officially unite the Uzbeks!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_uzbek_identity_desc;Our empire has collapsed and the Iranians have abandoned us. It is clear that our future now lays within the turanian highlands!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_turan_desc;The tribes of Turan have always been fighting eachother
column2: especially since the timurid collapse the situation has been tumultuous. But since we managed to subdue all the other tribes it's only appropiate to adopt the title of rulers of Turan!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_turan_desc;Even though the northern kyrgyz steppes technically aren't part of Turan
column2: they are inhabitated by our kinsmen nonetheless. Since we are now considered a regional power we should assume control over the region!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_kurdistan_desc;The recent modernization of our nation lead to a more centralized bureaucracy. European ideas
column2: like nationalism spread like a wildfire. Many students and intellectuals demand a more aggressive policy against the Turks to the west
column3: who have been oppressing the central anatolian Kurds. We should definitely integrate them into our nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: new_median_empire_desc;Now that our western brothers are freed from turkish oppression
column2: we should lay claim to the ancient region of Media. Even though the Adari
column3: Tats
column4: Talysh
column5: Gilaki and Mazandaranis aren't consider themselves to be kurdish
column6: they are most definitly closely related to us.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_hellas_desc;For years Hellas has been divided among several kingdoms or occupied by foreigners at the pleasing of our common enemies. To unite the Greek lands under a sole flag and one ruler is our only way to greatness.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

restore_poland_desc;The kingdom that the Piasts once worked so hard to reunify is now divided and without a king. We must strive to unite the Polish people and create a Polish nation to take the place of the kingdom that once was.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

propose_zapadoslavia_desc;For centuries our nation has been the pinnecle of western slavic culture. It is only fitting that we should propse the idea of a united west slavic state to the other powers;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_lotharingia_desc;As the new claimants to the Lotharingian crown
column2: we draw our legitimacy by appealing to the legacy of Charlemagne and Lothair. Under our patronage
column3: the exploits of our ancestors have once again become common knowledge
column4: both among our own people and throughout the courts of Europe.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_the_swahili_coast_title;Unite the City States of the Swahili Coast;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_the_swahili_coast_desc;Ever since the collapse of the Kilwa Sultanate
column2: which dominated the region for centuries
column3: the Swahili Coast was disunified and thrown into chaos. The many city states fought for control over the prosperous slave
column4: ivory and gold trade. However
column5: no Sultan has managed to reestablish the old glory of Kilwa and the region fell deeper into decline with the appearance of firearms
column6: aswell as the increasing egyptian presence. We must reunite the Swahili States under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: which ran along the many rivers of East Africa have been in decline for a long time. Yet
column3: these old trading stations and settlements could help us
column4: atleast in name
column5: to control the adjecent areas. Combinded with the adventures of 'Muuzaji Mkubwa' this expansion could reignite our trading power!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_madagascar_swa_desc;The kings of Magadascar have long been eyeballing the important trading hub of Mahajanga and a lot of minor skirmishes already happend in the border regions. We have to eliminate this threat and while doing so
column2: claim the authority over the island!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: establish_schools_swa_desc;Our old schools simply cant hold up with modern schools and even the Madrassas were only available for the elites. Now that we control a huge amount of land it also became important to spread the usage of the Swahili language. By funding these modern schools we can ensure that these institutions can spread both
column2: our faith and our language!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reestablish_the_adal_sultanate_desc;The Adal Sultanate once was the strongest muslim power in the Horn of Africa and fought the Ethiopian Empires for centuries
column2: but similar to their christian counterpart isolationism
column3: corruption and fragmentation lead to the decline of the Sultanate. Now multiple smaller Somali
column4: Afar
column5: Aussa and Oromo states are fighting for regional dominance
column6: while at the same time the new King of Shewa is eager to reunite Ethiopia. If we can reunite the muslims under our rule
column7: and destroy the Kingdom of Shewa
column8: we could establish ourselfs once again as the rulers of this region!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cushite_state_desc;The cushtic people have long suffered from domination of outside powers
column2: from the Ethiopians
column3: Arabs
column4: Bantus and Swahilis. With the arrival of european ideas of nationalism many intellectuals demand that we should follow a more aggressive stance towards countries
column5: that activaly suppress the cushitic people. While this agenda will most likely decrease relations with our neighbours
column6: it'll also give us the opportunity to establish ourselfs as the dominant force in Eastern Africa!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: build_new_jerusalem_desc;Now that we have united Ethiopia under our rule once more
column2: we should build a new capital. This new metropolis should serve as an attraction for the new jewish settlers and for the native population of Ethiopia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: jewish_ethiopia_desc;For centuries the Ethiopians had been ruled by dynasties of jewish origin and now that we have managed to end the Era of Princes and established ourselves as the hegemonic power in Ethiopia we have the opportunity to reclaim our legacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
a_new_capital_swa_title;A New Capital for the Sultanate;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
a_new_capital_swa_desc;Now that the Swahili City States are once more united we should build a new capital to emphasize the unity of our people!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_tanganyika_desc;With new technologies becoming available for us
column2: aswell as the growing interest of Europeans in African Matters we can and should increase our influence within Eastern Africa!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: legacy_of_chwezi_title;Claim the Legacy of the Chwezi Empire;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

legacy_of_chwezi_desc;The Chwezi Empire was a mythical empire in the oral traditions of our people and existed before the balkanisation of the kingdoms of the Great Lakes. Now that we have subdued all of the other rulers we can claim their legacy!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

leave_the_german_confederation_desc;Since the formation of our Great State the lingering question among our populace has been that of membership in the German Confederation. We sincerly believe that our state deservers more then to be a mere member of a greater sate
column2: we are our own people
column3: and so we shall remain
column4: our own nation!;x

column1: invite_frisia_desc;Our federation is glorious and it's fame has been felt through the world
column2: we should invite the Frisians to join us!;x

column1: lunch_masovian_uprising_desc;Ever since the polish district split
column2: the duchy of Masovia had attempted to  secure it's political independence from the rest of Poland. Now thanks to the efforts of the Bohemians this separation is hardly visable
column3: and our struggle for independence may come true only through military action.;x

column1: call_to_arms_in_poland_desc;Today is a day of blood and glory
column2: Let it be a day of resurrection! Gazing at France's rainbow
column3: The White Eagle launches into flight. Inspired by the sun of July
column4: He calls to us from above: "Arise
column7: Today is a day of your victory or death!";x

column2: commonly nicknamed "The Small Prince" is a prominent politician in the duchy of Masovia. His economic policys of interventionism as well as plans to abolish tariffs between Bohemia and Masovia may present a great opportunity to enrich our small dominion greatly.;x
egyseg
column3: fuggetlenseg!;x

column1: god_unity_independence_desc;The Revolutions of past years in Germany and the subsiquant reformation of states around us has proven that remnants of any feudal administration are a great weakness of a state. Therefore to preserve our integrity and unity
column2: under the guidance of god
column3: the following laws will pass into immediete effect.;x

column1: banat_form_croatia_desc;Free of Hungarian yoke we can finally govern ourselves freely;x
banat_join_croatia_desc;Become one with the existing Croatian state.;x
burzeland_form_siebenburg_desc;Free of Hungarian Yoke we can finally acomplish the dream of our ancestors of a united Siebenburgen state under german leadership.;x

build_the_corvinus_line_desc;Many wars between Hungary and Bohemia have begun by a northern invasion deep along the danube. In response Hungerian rulers have tried to fortify the danube and our border with bohemia so as to deley or stop a possible invasions
column2: though these plans were never really succesfull. In this case our General staff have proposed the idea of a construction of the "Corvinus line" a series of forifications along the danube river
column3: named after a great Hungarian general who soundly defeated the Bohemians on the field of battle.;x

column1: kunsag_boom_desc;The Kunsag are is rich in many mining and industrial resources
column2: no wonder then over the years it has become one of our most important regions strategicly-wise. We should embrace the industrial revolution happening there and rip it's benefits to the fullest extent.;x

column1: create_dacia_desc;The struggle between Hungary and Bulgaria have often left the smaller kingdoms in-between in a unfortunete position. Now that we control both the duchy of Moldova and Wallachia
column2: we should unite the two to form a stronger ally against out opponent;x

column1: claim_galicia_desc;For centuries the Halyych Rus and it's pathetic constitutional government have tried to secure it's independence from Hungary with the help of Bohemia
column2: but no more! We shall end their state once and for all.;x

column1: einn_konungr_einn_kountry_desc;The North Sea Empire ever since it first came into existance in 1013
column2: and later revived by Harald the Conqueror in 1066 after the battle of stamford bridge
column3: have been plauged with civil wars and matters of sucession. The Empire has split apart many times
column4: eventually though a system would develop where the Three Kingdoms - Denmark
column5: Norway and Jorvik could operate relativly independently off of each other while still using the same treasury. Later consolidations of the Empire would result in further integrations of the Three Kingdoms. The estabilshment of the Komingstaor - an imperial parliment by Olaf the Wise in 18th century have paved the way for a new wave of integration reform ideas that are still alive an well in the Anglo-Norse Society. These ideas are represented by the liberal factions
column6: calling for removal of all feudal remnaints and embracing a federal style of administration under the guidence of the king

column1: protect_frisia_desc;Frisians had always been a close ally of ours against the Saxons. It's poor people have always been plauged by the invasions of their neighbours and the attempts to incorporate the state into our Confederation under equal laws
column2: most notably by King Olaf the Wise in 1729. The offer was obviously declined
column3: due to the fear of marginalisation of the state in such a union. Now However with the Saxon Menace growing in strength
column4: perhaps we should again reach an agreement with the Frisians?;x

column1: create_the_nordic_monetary_union_desc;Although each memeber Kingdom of the North Sea Empire uses the same treasury
column2: each usues a diffrent kind of margloo currency. If we aim to end centralise the confederation
column3: we should perhaps create a proper monetary union to pave the way for use of singal currency in the future;x

column1: the_matter_of_angosaxons_desc;Over the Years Norse settlers bought out or took over the Anglo-Saxon lands and begun to create their own communitys
column2: mainly in the north-west. This process has largely stopped by th 14th century and an Anglo-Saxon identity had begun to form. Many uprisings
column3: settler commissions and even exiles to North America later
column4: and the Anglo-Saxon people are seen as anything but equal in the Union. Perhaps the time has come to change that?;x

column1: north_sea_protectorate_desc;"[...] And so we shall spread our Empire like a Black Raven spreads it's wings across pray
column2: and non shall stand in it's way." The Idea of a North Sea Protectorate had been prevelent throughout Anglo-Norse history. Whenever the North Sea Empire was not busy fighting to reunite itself
column3: it attempted to conquer the North Sea's coast to secure it's trade intrests. The idea is still prevelent in politics today
column4: largely supported by the conservative wings.;x

column1: greater_france_desc;The Expansion attempts deep into the Holy Roman Empire had been the focus of many past king's in the past. Even the The Holy Roman Empire is gone
column2: our goals have not changed a bit
column3: the natural borders of France are yet to be reached!;x

column1: enact_huit_regles_du_commerce_desc;Huit Regles du Commerce is a simple system of rules applied to all trade actions in France. It's integral part details the rules of trade with our north american colonies and is extremly mercantilistic in nature. After bringing our colonies back under our heel we should reenact these laws to bring much needed funds for the crown.;x
renovate_the_paris_university_desc;The Paris University has been the top acedemy in Europe for centuries
column2: but recently it's architecture is mostly a realic of the past
column3: and is in despretate need for renovation. Work on the academy would certainly appeal to the masses...;x

column1: compose_new_german_constitution_title;Compose a Constitution for the German Confederation;x
compose_new_german_constitution_desc;German Confederation has existed since the 1820s when mass revolutions started due to the censorship of liberal schools of thought
column2: later growing nationalistic in nature. The revolutionaries at one point even almost entered the royal palace in Dortmund
column3: wanting to capture the Holy Roman Emperor. Eventually though
column4: the Emperor back down and the Holy Roman Empire had been rebranded to the German Confederation
column5: with the ultimate goal of unifing under one banner. Today many states still oppose unification particularly those in the south and the lowlands
column6: but we have maneged to gather enough infuence to push for a Constitution for the German Confederation - a first step towards unification.;x

column1: legalise_the_urburschenschaft_corps_desc;The Urburschenschaft Corps is a small miltia comprised of the members of Urburschenschaft organization
column2: was created in 1820s during the German Revolution. Their members are most notably known for almost overrunning the Dortmund Royal Palace and are seen as heros by many of the German people. Ofcourse such actions were later declared as criminal
column3: by the Emperor himself
column4: however after the compromise in 1828 and the creation of German Confederation their legal status has not yet been publicly disscussed. Many now think that legalising the group would prove advntageous in the fight to unify Germany
column5: as it would appeal to the liberal masses...;x

column1: incorporate_poland_desc;Poland has first came into Bohemian possesion in 1300 when the King of Bohemia - Wenceslaus II - defeated the usurper Polish king Przemsyl in Greater Poland. Since that the Premysid and later Luxemburg dynastys were traditinally Coronated as Kings of Bohemia and Poland. The Poles however had hardly seen themselves as part of the realm. With the duchy of Masovia gone
column2: perhaps we can change something in this regard;x
there is no place for setbacks. The idea of a prauge-vistula railway involves the enchancment of the grain export industry
column3: whose main centers are located along the vistula river as well as connecting the polish lands with the ones in the Kingdom of Bohemia granting greater mobility to our troops;x

column1: embrace_industrialisation_desc;Many Kings of Polabia have merely relied on our geopolitical situation to expand our trade infuence across the Baltic Sea. These days however it appears to not be enough
column2: if we wish to mainain our integrity as a state we must perform extensive works on our economy and participate in the so-called "Industrial Revolution";x

column1: bend_the_knee_desc;Although a foolish idea at first perhaps our nation can be granted membership in the newly created German Confederation in order to secure our sovernighty. Many states culturally distant from the Germans have joined the Confederation
column2: perhaps we too can function in it the same way?;x

column1: greater_polabia_desc;Polabian Kings have always dreamed of an empire streatich around the entire southern baltic coast. With our newly found power
column2: perhaps we can finally accomplish that dream!;x

column1: baltic_centralisation_desc;The Baltic Governorships have existed since the end of the 17th century and had proven to be quite a dated creation for today's times. We should centralise them to gain greater control and influence in the region;x

revise_treaty_of_malmo_desc;The Treaty of Malmo signed in 1801 forced Sweden to relinquish many of it claims on the land of Kingdom of Norway and Denmark. The treaty was singed after the death of King Charles the XIV
column2: a great general who suffered a fatal wound in the battle of Oslo against the Norse meanace. Following his death
column3: his heir immedietly signed this shamefull peace treaty
column4: but finally we stand in a strong enough position to lay our claims back on those lands.;x

column1: enact_the_column_of_charles_xiv_desc;Charles the XIV was probably the last great King-General of Sweden. He assumed the throne in 1782 and ruled until his death 1800. His reign was characterised by many succesfull military campaigns deep into ruthenian lands
column2: bringing sweden much needed wealth. His luck run out when he attempted to recover Lost Swedish territory of Malmo in 1798. An uprising in Norway had conviced him that it was the best time to strike the North Sea Empire and assumed personal leadership in a campaign to Norway. He died in the battle of Oslo in 1800
column3: teaking a shot to the chest and later bleeding out to death in his tent.;x

column1: baltic_dominium_desc;The Baltic Dominion has been the goal of Swedish foreign policys since the 14th century. The idea says that Baltic sea should be made into a Swedish in-land Sea
column2: granting us greater control over trade in the region. Our great victories over the past few years will surely allow us to purse this policy more througly now that we teaken all our rightfull lands and centralized our administration;x

column1: moderinise_the_caroleans_title;Carolean Infantry Modernization and Conscription Reform;x
moderinise_the_caroleans_desc;Recent losses to our neighbours to the west have proven that the 18th century Carolean infantry model is quite outdated and requiers thorough reforms. Furthermore
column2: the Conscription laws after 1800 had only been made more lenient and lenient. It's high time we get our military back into order.;x

column1: subdue_eastern_maghreb_desc;Even at the height of our empire we never secured the Maghreb region.This must change
column2: we must liberate our Muslim brothers and push our border to the sea!;x"
column11: reb region, this must be corrected, unification with our Maghreb brothers must commence and we must push our border to the Atlantic;x
column14: e must unify with our Muslim brothers and push our border to the Sea!;x
column15: ify with our brothers in the Maghreb abd push our border to the Sea!;x
column18: ghreb and push our border to the sea!;x

column1: control_mauretania_desc;We have marched our great armies to the Atlantic and unified the Maghreb under our glorious empire however
column2: this does not mean we should sit idly by it is crucial that we extend our influence south into Mauretania!"

column1: invade_andalusia_desc;Our conquest of the Maghreb has sent it's Wilaya's into chaos we must secure Al-Andalus before the Christian Kingdom's seize the opportunity!
nile_expansion_desc;The Nile is crucial to our nation as such
column2: we must outift an expedition to find it's source and claim it for our empire!;x

column1: control_eritrean_highlands_desc;The tribes that make up the horn of Africa have long been a thorn in our side we must commit to uniting them under our benevolent rule.;x
claim_palmyra_desc;Advancements in medicine means we can claim the Palmyra region.;x
claim_hargeysa_desc;The Somali desert cannot be allowed to fall into any other countries hands it is imperative we claim it before anyone else.;x;
claim_abu_hamed_desc;Abu Hamed sits a short distance from the nile
column2: we should claim it before anyone else can.;x

column1: claim_rutbah_desc;Rutbah is a hotly contested area in Arabia we should make it absolutely clear that the area is ours.;x
claim_nefud_desc;Claiming the deserts of Nefud will put a significant buffer between the Arabian Tribes and the holy city of Medina.;x
claim_dahna_desc;Claiming the deserts of Nefud will put a significant buffer between the Arabian Tribes and Iraq.;x

form_hispania_desc;Finally after a thousand years of conflict between the sqaubbling Iberian Kingdoms and Emirates we have come out as the undisputed masters of the peninsula we should use our new postion to unite the Iberians in the glorious Empire of Hispania!;x
dom_perm_desc;The Great Perm lies to our east blockading our path to Siberia
column2: this cannot stand we must immediately demand their subjection.;x

column1: unite_daghestan_desc;For too long the clans in Daghestan have been both under foreign rule and squabbling amongst each other
column2: this ends today with our powerful postiton we shall proclaim a united Daghestan ready to fight to the death before we bow for another master!;x

column1: subdue_the_selkups_desc;The Khanates of Selkupia and Shor lie deep within Siberia
column2: this makes fighting them no matter how primitive they may be
column3: a hassle
column4: thus we offer them the chance to join our empire peacefully and bloodless and our march through the east can contuine unhindered.;x

column1: western_ambition_desc;Kurdistan and Iraq cannot be the summit of our ambitions in the west! We must continue our push into the Anatolian Peninsula!;x
claim_iraq_desc;Iraq was the center of the Islamic World for many years
column2: by annexing it we will give our Empire great legitimacy.;x
